name: SCP: Terror Hunt
storyline: The witch will cast her final "speall", and the things she has seen will all be reduced to dust.
summary: Terror Hunt is a modification for "SCP: Containment Breach". The mod is developed by the same creator of the Five Nights at Freddy's Mod. This mod adds and alters many aspects of the base game. These additions include new SCPs, new rooms, new items, and a brand new storyline for the main character!
